#summary Spawn manager hull buffer.
#labels D-Cvar

= Description =

Prevents aliens from getting stuck in walls partially when spawning non-drone aliens with the AI director. This cvar adds this many units to the alien's collision hull when determining where the AI director can spawn aliens.

|| *Revision Added* || *Default* || *[CvarFlags Flags]* || *[ParamType Parameter Type]* ||
|| r304 || `25` || [FCVAR_CHEAT] || [Float] ||
